channel.title: Pages on Miguel Fernandez Arce
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Miguel Fernandez Arce

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Miguel, also known as muit. Game programmer & voice actor. The majority of my work in videogames is centered around the design and implementation of videogame systems and tools in C++. If you like to code, stick around and have a look at my posts! Many of my projects are open-source and can be found at Piperift. Currently working at CI Games, previously Ubisoft Stockholm, EA DICE & Splash Damage.

item.title: Voice Acting
item.description: Demos All demos recorded in one take. Effects: de-noiser Spanish A - Happy, Angry, Sad, Shy . . . . . . soon B - Registros, Tonos . . . soon English A - Happy, Angry, Sad, Shy . . . . . . soon B - Registers, Tones . . . soon Studies Polford - Curso Integral 2022-2023 Had the chance to learn closely from three legendary voice actors. Luis Posada, Oscar Barber√°n & Jordi Brau who often voice actors like Robin Williams, Johnny Depp, Jim Carrey, Leonardo DiCaprio and many more in spanish.
